name:
Muboriz
Istamov
introDesc: I build websites from scratch — clean, responsive, and made with love.Real code, thoughtful design, and a touch of personality.
serviceOneTitle:
Built from Scratch or
Based on Your Design
____________-------
serviceOneDesc: Whether you have a full design or just a wild idea in your head — I’ll turn it into a working website, coded by hand and tailored to your style.
serviceTwoDesc: Hover effects, subtle transitions, scroll reveals — I add clean, modern motion to your site that brings the interface to life without overdoing it.
serviceThreeDesc: Your site will look and work great on phones, tablets, laptops, and everything in between.
serviceFourDesc: Once your site is done, I’ll help you publish it using GitHub Pages. No confusing setup — just a clean link you can share with the world.
